mapper.select: SELECT TB_CO_PGW.PGW_ID, TB_CO_PGW.EMS_ID, IFNULL(EMS_INFO.EMS_NAME,'-') AS EMS_NAME, TB_CO_PGW.VENDOR_ID, IFNULL(TB_CO_VENDOR.VENDOR_NAME,'-') AS VENDOR_NAME, TB_CO_PGW.PGW_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(TB_CO_PGW.INSTALL_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS INSTALL_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(TB_CO_PGW.UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(TB_CO_PGW.PGW_IP,'-') AS IP, IFNULL(TB_CO_PGW.OPR_STATUS,'0') AS OPR_STATUS FROM TB_CO_PGW LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT EMS_ID, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(EMS_NAME separator ', ') FROM TB_CO_EMS AS EMSA WHERE EMSA.EMS_ID = EMSB.EMS_ID ) as EMS_NAME FROM TB_CO_EMS AS EMSB ) AS EMS_INFO ON TB_CO_PGW.EMS_ID = EMS_INFO.EMS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CO_VENDOR ON TB_CO_PGW.VENDOR_ID = TB_CO_VENDOR.VENDOR_ID WHERE TB_CO_PGW.PGW_ID = #{pgw_id} GROUP BY PGW_ID
SELECT NODE, PREFER_TYPE, NODE_TYPE, REDUN_TYPE, GRP_NAME FROM TB_CO_GW_NODE WHERE NE_ID = #{pgw_id}
SELECT SERVER, STATUS, ROLE, CHK_STS FROM TB_CO_GW_NTP WHERE NE_ID = #{pgw_id}
SELECT NODE, PORT, ACT_STS, OPR_STS, MATE_PORT, DETAIL_STS, DESCRIPTION FROM TB_CO_GW_PORT WHERE NE_ID = #{pgw_id}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT FROM TB_CO_PGW WHERE PGW_ID = #{pgw_id}
